tasks.title: Setup Frontend Environment
tasks.description: Create a new Vue or React project for the transaction-test-demo.

tasks.title: Implement Frontend UI
tasks.description: Implement the UI for the transaction-test-demo with a control panel for environment setup, test initiation, real-time data display, and result export.

tasks.title: Setup Backend Environment
tasks.description: Create a new Node.js project for the backend service or extend the existing fake-backend.

tasks.title: Implement Backend API
tasks.description: Implement the API for receiving test initiation commands from the frontend.

tasks.title: Implement Test Scheduler
tasks.description: Implement a test scheduler on the backend to execute transactions at a preset frequency and of different types.

tasks.title: Integrate AAStar SDK
tasks.description: Integrate the AAStar_SDK into the backend to execute both traditional and SuperPaymaster-integrated transactions.

tasks.title: Implement Data Recording
tasks.description: Implement data recording on the backend to store detailed data for each transaction.
